short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download liked videos or any TikTok videos easily without watermark. Download search results, likes, all user videos, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀✨ Say Hello to Your New Fave TikTok Downloader! ✨🚀  

🎉  Easy TikTok Video Downloader is here, and it’s serving no-watermark realness! Ready to level up your TikTok game? Let’s dive into the features that’ll make your For You Page even more 🔥:  

1️⃣ Batch Downloading 🎥💾  
No more saving one video at a time—what is this, 2010? With our extension, grab ALL your fave TikToks in one go. Save time, scroll smarter. 🕒➡️🎬  

2️⃣ No Sketchy Third-Party Apps 🚫👾  
Ditch those dodgy sites and apps. Everything happens right in your browser, like magic. ✨ No cringe downloads, just vibes.  

3️⃣ Download Your Likes 💖⬇️  
You didn’t create it, but you loved it—now it’s yours! Download any liked videos from your account and keep the bangers forever. 🎶📥  

4️⃣ Save for Later Links 🔗📲  
Busy RN? Get download links and grab your TikToks whenever you’re ready. Your personal TikTok library awaits. 📚⚡ (*P.S. Access denied errors might pop up ‘cause TikTok API is always pulling stunts.* 🙄)  

5️⃣ We Got Privacy on Lock 🔒  
Your data? Yours. Everything runs in your browser, so no snooping. Stay private, stay slayin’. 👀👑  

6️⃣ Download Searches 🔍⬇️
Found a goldmine in the search results? Download entire TikTok search results in one swoop. No endless scrolling—just pure, saved TikTok goodness. 🏄‍♂️🎥

7️⃣ Download Any Playing Video 🎯📥
Watching a gem and want it NOW? Download the video you’re watching instantly—no detours, just direct downloads. Hit play, hit save. 💾✨

✨ So... Why Wait?
Smash that download button 🖱️ and make TikTok your playground. Your watermark-free video journey starts NOW.  

🎶 Go ahead, legend—your TikTok takeover awaits. 🎶

PS: Some videos are re-uploaded with watermarks. This, we can not do anything about ;).

=== Change Log ===
v3.0.1
- Fix unexpected re-route bug.
v3.0.0
- Download any playing video
- Download searches & likes
- Bring back FYP & Explore downloads
- Better downloader overall.
v2.1.1
- Undo v2.1.0
- Fix styling
- Fix download failures
v2.1.0
- Handle explore and FYP(experimental)
v2.0.1
- Fix empty video name bug.
- Ask users to rate the extension.
v2.0.0
- Download using the extension!!!!!
v1.5.2
- Remove activeTab permission that was not being used.
v1.5
- Fix bug causing the "copy all video links" button to disappear.
- Add FAQ message stating that I will not remove watermarks since I am incompetent.
v1.4
- Add ability to download only TikTok liked videos (personal liked videos)
- Introduced few more bugs
v1.3
- Allow downloading TikTok liked videos(with bugs)!
